items.title: By Jarmusch
items.description: American dishes with a European twist. Great choice for breakfast and lunch.

items.title: Soi3
items.description: Good value for your money. The flavors come quite close to how you can experience them in Thailand.

items.title: Supermercado
items.description: Nice place to go for a drink, as well as dinner. The food is okay, it's mostly the ambiance and vibes that attract people here.

items.title: Foodhallen
items.description: A very comfortable atmosphere is found at the Foodhallen. You can order all sorts of dishes from different cuisines around the world. A little on the pricey side.

items.title: HÃ©roine
items.description: One of the more high-end hotspots. Mostly French with a little bit of inspiration taken from other cuisines. Beautiful retro decor.

items.title: Hinoki
items.description: All the ramen classics are available here. From tonkotsu black garlic to chicken shoyu.

items.title: Restaurant Rotonde
items.description: Vibrant vegetarian dishes. A little high end, also very creative with combinations and presentation. They make use of local produce and vegetables.

items.title: Tensai ramen
items.description: Very pretty restaurant with an open kitchen. The ramen dishes on the menu consist of pretty creative combinations of already established classics.

items.title: Fafi
items.description: A Surinamese joint that sells the best bara's in town. You can get all sorts of bara's or sandwiches here.

items.title: Gangnam Korean BBQ
items.description: One of the cheaper spots to have kbbq at. Still pretty good and tasty.
